title.rendered: THE TEN SPOT sault ste marie

content.rendered:
beauty bar in sault ste marie | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in sault ste marie. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!

beauty bar in sault ste marie | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 710 second line east unit #102 sault ste. marie, ontario
  • 705-575-7768
  • saultstemarie@thetenspot.com
  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon. - tue: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

wed. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: closed

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Great first TenSpot experience. Love my gel mani and pedi. The company was lovely, too!
Kimberly Lauzon
1721854420
I came here for my first brazilian wax ever, and Racheal made it such a comfortable and relaxing experience. I was so nervous and she calmed my nerves and talked me through the whole thing. right from walking in the building i was welcomed kindly.... The building is very clean and has a really nice vibe. everything about my appointment was awesome and I will definitely be going back.read more
Shannon Lee
1717534967
Hallee is awesome! Very welcoming, kind and gentle. Will be booking again
Kim Watt
1715876333
My favorite place to go for waxing. I can hardly say I've been to all the wax parlors but I have had great experiences here.
Arwen J. M.
1713546780
I am not one to take the time to leave reviews. But, I absolutely love, love this salon, everyone is just incredibly nice and regardless what you get done there you just feel pampered; also, their complementary coffee is fantastic (coming from a... coffee snob).They are also super accommodating, as sometimes I can’t find childcare for my youngest when I have a appointment and I have to bring her; but they are amazing about it!10/10 every time I’ve been here!read more
sarah cooper
1710877424
Always an excellent experience. Nicole is amazing at what she does. Very thorough and takes her time. She is my favorite!
Sherry Livingston
1710372884
I love these ladies. Everyone is always so friendly and welcoming. The space is always spotless, and they always do a great job. It’s perfect!
Jaime Brideau
1709913475
I called a couple weeks ago to book in 4 family members for my moms birthday today, they were sooo accommodating to my tricky request. We spent a couple hours here today and we had a blast... we had mimosas and chatted away with our salon ladies. I... couldn't have asked for a better experience honestly.. thank you ladies for making my moms birthday so memorable and fun! I will be back in the near future. 💛💛read more
Alyssa Place
1708132800
Always happy with the service and expertise of staff at The Ten Spot - I've had manis, pedis, brow waxing and facials all fabulous.
Lynn Stewart
1704299980
Good nail place, got a french manicure for my wedding the lady did a great job. It is a little pricey but you're paying for the salon experience. Got a glass of wine to thought that was different
Nicole Belanger
1663951722
